name: Healer LFG
description:
Known bug that the crossbow drifts backwards a bit during the game. It should reset when you die.
Accidentally deleted the project files so this is final :,)

Controls

Spells
[Q][W][E][R][T]

Targeting

Get Information
[Mouse Hover]
